languages.text: "Тяжек был бой, но тем славней победа".
"The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."
languages.original_text: "Тяжек был бой, но тем славней победа".

traits.locale_text: "The battle was hard. All the more glorious is our victory."
"The battle was hard. All the more glorious is our victory."
"The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."
"The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."
"The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."

languages.text: “那场战斗非常艰苦，但正因如此，胜利才更加光荣。”
languages.original_text: "The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."

traits.locale_text: “那场战斗非常艰苦，但正因如此，胜利才更加光荣。”

languages.text: 「戦いは苛烈だったが、それだけに勝利がより輝かしいものとなる」
languages.original_text: "The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."

traits.locale_text: 「戦いは苛烈だったが、それだけに勝利がより輝かしいものとなる」

languages.text: « Le combat a été rude, mais la victoire n'en est que plus glorieuse. »
languages.original_text: "The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."

traits.locale_text: « Le combat a été rude, mais la victoire n'en est que plus glorieuse. »

languages.text: «Ha sido una dura batalla, pero eso hace que la victoria sea aún más gloriosa».
languages.original_text: "The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."

traits.locale_text: «Ha sido una dura batalla, pero eso hace que la victoria sea aún más gloriosa».

languages.text: "Der Kampf war hart, aber das macht den Sieg umso ruhmreicher."
languages.original_text: "The battle was hard, but that makes victory all the more glorious."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kampf war hart, aber das macht den Sieg umso ruhmreicher."
